childMarkdownRemark.html: I am a Front End Developer and Web Accessibility Advocate based out of Toronto, Canada who can be found on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Codepen

I'm currently in the process of developing a new website, but in the meantime, you can see some of my recent work at Declutter, Reason One, and Diabetes Canada.

I'm passionate about creating inclusive user-focused web applications for purpose-driven organizations. When it comes to code, my priorities are accessibility, consistency, and reusability.

I spend a lot of time on the internet, playing videos games and reading, but would almost always rather be surrounded by trees. I care about social justice and the environment.

If you want to get in touch, send a message to hidanielle.dev [at] gmail.com or reach out on social media.
